summary.para: Contains information that describes a network address.

remarks.para: This structure is sent with the macro.

summary.para: A pointer to a NET_ADDRESS_INFO structure that describes the network address, either a named address or an IP address.
The network port number, if the address described by pAddrInfo is an IP address.
The prefix length corresponding to the address, if the address described by pAddrInfo is an IP address.
